intro: Cologania longifolia var. stricta, commonly known as the slender leaf cologania, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its narrow, elongated leaves and clusters of small, pale yellow flowers. Native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia, it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its delicate foliage and attractive floral display. It requires well-drained soil and consistent moisture to flourish.
